medical_history.chief_complaint: Liver dysfunction following intravenous glucocorticoid therapy and statin use in two patients with active Graves' orbitopathy.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient 1 experienced liver dysfunction after 2.3 g of methylprednisolone and simvastatin; liver enzymes normalized after withdrawal of simvastatin. Patient 2 had a slight increase in liver enzymes after 2.5 g of methylprednisolone. A further increase was observed three weeks after discontinuing IVGC, only normalizing after stopping rosuvastatin.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Patient 1: Graves' disease, thyroidectomy, hypertensive cardiomyopathy; Patient 2: Graves' disease, transient ischemic attack, radioiodine therapy.
